text:
@MarshaBlackburn Marsha 
Clean up your own house before deflecting over to another. We know China is not most transparent country but we also know the GOP is the same. You knew in early Feb when you got a private briefing on Covid19’s & you didn’t tell us. Should I sue you too? Sell your stocks?

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
